properties.title: Hidden Treasure Villa
properties.description: Discover your own hidden gem at this fully furnished villa nestled in the tranquil surroundings of Upper Zion’s Hill. This well-constructed two-story home offers both comfort and privacy, situated at the end of a quiet private road. Whether you're looking for a peaceful retreat or a valuable investment, this property is perfect for island living. Key Features: - Spacious Living Arrangements: - 3 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, spread across two levels. - Upper level includes 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a laundry room, infinity pool, and large front porch with side patio. - The first level features a separate bedroom, bathroom, and living area, which can be used for guests or rented independently. - Outdoor Amenities: - Stunning sea and mountain views from multiple vantage points. - Infinity pool fo

properties.title: Susanna Cottage
properties.description: Dreaming of your own charming island retreat? Susanna Cottage, a historic Saba-style home, is now on the market! This cozy and fully furnished cottage offers everything you need for a peaceful life on Saba Island, including breathtaking views, comfort, and convenience in a serene neighborhood. Key Features: - Charming Interior: - Graceful living room with cozy décor. - Separate dining room perfect for intimate meals. - Well-equipped kitchen designed for convenience. - Spacious master bedroom and a guest bedroom. - Two bathrooms, one featuring a shower and the other with a bathtub for ultimate comfort. - Outdoor Living: - Relax on the balcony and enjoy scenic views of the sea and surrounding mountains. - The patio is complete with outdoor furniture, ideal for soaking in the peaceful atmosph

properties.title: STATIA Poolhouse and Bungalows
properties.description: Introducing STATIA Poolhouse and Bungalows, an eco-friendly retreat for sale near Kay Bay (Venus Bay) on St Eustatius. This unique property offers existing tourist infrastructure in a prime natural setting, with ocean views and proximity to hiking trails, diving sites, and the island’s capital, Oranjestad. The sale includes the land and buildings only, allowing full freedom for future property development. Key Features: - Eco-Friendly & Private: The property consists of a poolhouse, swimming pool, and 9 wooden bungalows, each with an open patio, kitchen, bedroom, and bathroom. Additional structures include two storage buildings, a lookout terrace with restrooms, a large cistern, paved parking, chain-link fence, and entrance gate. - Prime Location: Ideally situated near natural attractions

properties.title: Daphne Cottage
properties.description: Step back in time with Daphne Cottage, a lovingly preserved historic home built in 1850, located in the heart of Windwardside. This charming 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom retreat captures the essence of traditional Saban living while offering modern conveniences for today’s lifestyle. With its classic red roof, inviting veranda, and vibrant flower gardens, Daphne Cottage exudes warmth and authenticity. From the front patio, enjoy sweeping views of Windwardside village and the Caribbean Sea, while the rear garden opens to Mount Scenery and Mas’Cohone Hill—ensuring beauty from every angle. Perfectly positioned within walking distance of shops, markets, and restaurants, Daphne Cottage combines historic charm, comfort, and convenience in one rare offering. Key Features - Historic Character & Ideal Loc

properties.title: The Glasshouse
properties.description: Introducing The Glasshouse, a striking modern retreat tucked into the lush rainforest of Saba’s exclusive neighborhood, The Level. Overlooking the charming village of Windwardside and the Caribbean Sea, this 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom property offers unmatched privacy, luxury, and tranquility. Designed for seamless indoor-outdoor living, the home is bathed in natural light through expansive glass windows and doors, making each space feel open, bright, and deeply connected to nature. Whether you’re enjoying a peaceful nap in the hammock, entertaining guests on the balcony, or soaking up the mountain views from the plunge pool, The Glasshouse is your elevated island sanctuary. properties.title: Iguana Rock House
properties.description: Nestled in the prestigious Windwardside area on Booby Hill, Iguana Rock House offers an unparalleled living experience with 180-degree ocean views, capturing the breathtaking sights of nearby islands and the towering peak of Mount Scenery. This charming two-story home features two spacious bedrooms and three bathrooms, providing the perfect combination of comfort and functionality. The upper level boasts a large master suite with expansive views of the Caribbean Sea, a luxurious bathroom, and a generously sized walk-in closet. The open-plan living area integrates a large living room, dining room, and kitchen with direct access to the patio, guest bathroom, and laundry room. The property also includes a one-bedroom guest apartment with a private entrance from the garden level, offering priv

properties.title: View Villa
properties.description: Experience luxurious island living in this expansive, fully furnished two-story villa located in the exclusive area of The Level, near Windwardside, Saba. Meticulously maintained and cared for by the same expat couple for over 40 years, this residence embodies elegance, comfort, and timeless Caribbean style. With generous indoor and outdoor spaces, stunning views, and thoughtful design throughout, this property offers a rare opportunity to own one of Saba’s finest homes — a sanctuary of sophistication surrounded by the island’s natural beauty. Key Features: - Spacious Interiors - Two stories with three bedrooms and four full bathrooms. - Generous living and dining areas perfect for entertaining. - Fully equipped kitchen designed for culinary enthusiasts. - Additional features include three

properties.title: Seagrape Cottage
properties.description: Welcome to Seagrape Cottage, the only waterfront home for sale on Saba Island, where the tranquil waters of Cove Bay become your front yard. This charming 1-bedroom, 1.5-bathroom Caribbean cottage is perfectly positioned to capture the natural beauty and serenity of the sea. Designed for peaceful island living, Seagrape Cottage combines comfort, privacy, and stunning ocean views. Whether you’re seeking a secluded personal retreat or a property with expansion potential, this home offers an unmatched connection to the Caribbean’s unspoiled beauty — where the rhythm of the waves defines your days. properties.title: House on the Path
properties.description: Escape to the serene charm of House on The Path — a classic Saba-style cottage for sale, perched 1,500 feet above sea level on the scenic route to Mount Scenery. Just a short five-minute hike from Windwardside, this secluded retreat offers total privacy surrounded by lush nature. Perfect for nature lovers, adventure seekers, and eco-travelers, House on The Path captures the essence of unspoiled Caribbean living. Tucked into Saba’s tropical landscape, this cottage is both a peaceful getaway and a true expression of the island’s traditional charm. Key Features: - Unique Living Experience A cozy, fully furnished cottage designed in authentic Saba style. Relax in the tranquility of the tropical forest from a hammock or plantation chair. properties.title: Rainbow Cottage
properties.description: Discover Rainbow Cottage, a charming and historic Caribbean home nestled in the heart of Windwardside—the vibrant tourist capital of Saba Island. Often described as “The Unspoiled Queen” of the Caribbean, Saba offers an enchanting mix of nature, culture, and serenity. Built in 1900, Rainbow Cottage is a picture-perfect 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom home that feels like it stepped out of a fairy tale. With its classic Saban architecture and warm, welcoming character, this cottage is ideal for island living or a vacation retreat. Key Features: Prime Location: Located just a short stroll from Windwardside’s shops, cafes, and restaurants, this property offers both convenience and tranquility. The cottage sits on a peaceful street with private parking and space for future expansion. Ocean Views & Outdo

properties.title: Anslyn Estate
properties.description: Embrace the timeless charm of Saba at Anslyn Estate, a hillside sanctuary that blends traditional island living with modern versatility. Set just steps from Windwardside village yet cocooned in privacy, this unique property features a main residence, a fully self-contained guest cottage, and an adaptable third unit currently used as a gym. Perfect for peaceful island living, remote work, or a boutique hospitality venture, Anslyn Estate offers panoramic views of Windwardside and the Caribbean Sea in a lush, garden-filled setting. Steeped in history, the estate was lovingly built by Arthur Anslyn, a renowned Saban sea captain and diver who played a pivotal role in local history. Surrounded in the past by farmland, it was once a community hub for fresh eggs and fruit — a tradition reflected t

properties.title: Middle Island Property
properties.description: Discover the Middle Island Property — a beautiful piece of land for sale in Saba, located in a peaceful and scenic area along Wells Bay Road. This ocean-view lot offers breathtaking panoramas of the Caribbean Sea and the iconic Diamond Rock, just minutes from the island’s capital, The Bottom. Set in a quiet, developing neighborhood, this property combines natural beauty with convenience. Easily accessible via a private road off the main route, it’s the perfect location to build your Caribbean dream home, vacation retreat, or investment property. Key Features: • Ocean Views & Peaceful Setting Enjoy unobstructed Caribbean ocean views in a serene and private environment. The property’s elevated position captures cool breezes and panoramic vistas while remaining close to Saba’s main attraction

properties.title: Treasured Horseshoe Property
properties.description: Seize the opportunity to own a piece of paradise with the Treasured Horseshoe Property — a stunning ocean-view lot for sale on Saba, now available at a reduced price of $150,000. Located in the highly desirable community of Zion’s Hill (Hell’s Gate), this spacious 1,584 m² parcel offers panoramic Caribbean Sea views, natural beauty, and easy access to some of Saba’s most famous attractions, including Cove Bay and the Tide Pools. This exceptional Saba real estate opportunity combines scenic tranquility with development potential — ideal for building your island home, vacation retreat, or investment property in the Dutch Caribbean. Key Features: - Panoramic Ocean & Island Views Take in spectacular, unobstructed views of the deep blue Caribbean Sea and neighboring islands — including St. Maar

properties.title: First Light Property
properties.description: Welcome to the First Light Property — a stunning and affordable piece of land for sale on Saba Island, featuring panoramic Caribbean Sea views and a peaceful hillside setting. This 901 m² lot sits in Lower Zion’s Hill, just a short walk from Cove Bay and moments from the island’s main road. Wake up each morning to brilliant sunrises over the ocean and enjoy views of nearby islands and Mount Scenery, the tallest peak in the Dutch Kingdom. This property offers an incredible opportunity to build your dream home or invest in Saba real estate at a great value. properties.title: Sunrise Ridge
properties.description: Don’t miss this extraordinary opportunity to own a large ocean-view property on Saba Island at an exceptional value. The Sunrise Ridge Land Opportunity is now available at a 40% discount, priced at just $40 per m² — a rare find in the Caribbean Netherlands. This 1.28-acre (5,169 m²) parcel of land sits on Saba’s picturesque northeast side, overlooking Cove Bay, the airport, and the lush peak of Mount Scenery. With expansive views of St. Maarten, St. Barts, and St. Eustatius, this property offers unmatched natural beauty and the perfect foundation for your dream home or family estate. Key Features: - Panoramic Caribbean Views Enjoy wide, unobstructed vistas of the Caribbean Sea, Mount Scenery, and nearby islands. properties.title: Johnny's Ground Secret
properties.description: Discover this hidden gem on Saba Island — a spacious and private parcel of land for sale in Booby Hill, one of the island’s most peaceful and scenic areas. The Johnny’s Ground Property spans 1.04 acres (4,212 m²) and offers spectacular views of the Caribbean Sea and nearby islands, including Sint Maarten, Sint Eustatius, and Saint Barthélemy (St. Barts). Perfect for building your Caribbean dream home, this property combines privacy, natural beauty, and development potential in one of Saba’s most desirable locations. Key Features: - Panoramic Ocean & Island Views Enjoy breathtaking, uninterrupted views of the ocean and surrounding islands. From sunrise to sunset, this location offers a peaceful connection to nature and the beauty of the unspoiled Caribbean. - Secluded Yet Convenient Locatio

properties.title: Quill Land
properties.description: This expansive and pristine Quill Land, located in the Whitewall area at the base of Quill Mountain, offers an extraordinary opportunity for multiple developments on the island of St. Eustatius (Statia). Spanning an impressive 185 acres, this tropical paradise boasts stunning ocean views and natural beauty, making it an ideal location for large-scale projects. properties.title: Lynch Beachfront Estate
properties.description: Discover the exceptional opportunity to own the Lynch Beachfront Estate, a stunning 1.5-acre property now available for sale on the picturesque island of Sint Eustatius. This slightly sloped land is ideally situated near a unique beach, making it perfect for commercial development. Enjoy the tranquility of a quiet area while taking in wide open views of the Caribbean Sea on the Atlantic side, with the majestic peak of The Quill visible in the opposite direction. rentals.title: Spyglass Villa
rentals.description: Spyglass Villa offers stunning Caribbean views and luxurious accommodations for your Saba vacation. This beautifully appointed villa features modern amenities and outdoor living spaces.

rentals.title: Effie's Cottage
rentals.description: Effie's Cottage is a cozy retreat perfect for couples seeking an authentic Saban experience. This charming cottage offers comfort and character in the heart of Windwardside.

rentals.description: Suzanna Cottage is a charming Saban vacation rental offering authentic island living. Enjoy stunning views and traditional architecture in this fully furnished cottage.

rentals.description: Compass Cottage offers comfortable accommodations in the heart of Windwardside. This well-appointed vacation rental is perfect for exploring all that Saba has to offer.

rentals.title: Flamboyant Cottage
rentals.description: Flamboyant Cottage is a delightful vacation rental named after the beautiful Flamboyant tree. This cozy cottage offers a perfect retreat for couples or solo travelers.
